basics.name: Rizwan Khan
basics.label: Senior DevOps Consultant
basics.summary:
An experienced Senior DevOps Consultant, I have always been driven by automation and its potential for streamlining operations. With a strong focus on reliability and delivering successful outcomes, I bring a versatile skill set to any team. My commitment to staying updated and continuously learning in a fast-paced environment is a key aspect of my professional approach.

Based in Toronto, Canada.

_This resume is built and deployed with a [GitHub Actions CI/CD workflow](https://github.com/rizwan-kh/resume)._

work.summary: Accenture Inc is a leading Management consulting and digital transformation company.
highlights: Successfully led a client project involving the migration of applications to containers and their deployment on Kubernetes. This initiative encompassed diverse technology stacks, resulting in a remarkable 40% reduction in infrastructure costs and an impressive web application uptime of 99.3%
Demonstrated expertise in managing a vast portfolio of 200+ Kubernetes clusters, overseeing their upgrades and lifecycle management
Spearheaded the security management of container images and Kubernetes clusters, ensuring robust protection and adherence to best practices
Implemented automation for daily tasks and maintained comprehensive documentation, fostering efficient operations and knowledge sharing within the team
Designed and delivered CI/CD pipelines for multiple transformation projects, enabling seamless software delivery and continuous integration

Proficiently implemented DevOps CI/CD pipelines for MLOps on Azure (Azure Machine Learning and Azure Data Factory) and AWS (SageMaker), empowering efficient and streamlined machine learning operations
Recognized as a subject matter expert (SME) in Kubernetes, providing invaluable insights and guidance on best practices and optimal utilization of the platform
*AWS, Azure, Docker, Kubernetes, Helm, Nagios, Rancher, Prometheus, Grafana, Python, Terraform, Nexus, Shell, Git, Agile, GitLab, EKS, AKS, GKE, MLOps, ADF*

work.summary: Accenture ME is a leading Management consulting and digital transformation company.
highlights: Employed Terraform-based blueprints to deploy AI solutions on AWS, Azure, and GCP via Azure DevOps pipelines, resulting in an impressive 75% reduction in deployment time
Developed a cutting-edge, cloud-native Platform as a Service (PaaS) from the ground up, offering a fully managed and cost-optimized infrastructure for running process-based applications

Established a highly robust and scalable Kubernetes multi-cluster and multi-tenant infrastructure, implementing comprehensive observability and adhering to industry-standard uptime Service Level Agreements (SLAs)
Created a continuous delivery solution tailored for process-based application development and deployment, enabling seamless and efficient release cycles
Streamlined development workflows by setting up efficient CI/CD processes for development teams, resulting in a 50% acceleration in release pipelines and enhanced reliability
Successfully managed IT infrastructure as code to ensure the reliability and stability of corporate-wide services, spanning both on-premises and cloud IaaS environments
*AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, Helm, Nagios, Prometheus, Python, Ansible, Terraform, Jenkins, Nexus, Shell, Git, Agile*
Implemented automated deployment and package installation using Chef, streamlining the provisioning process for efficient and consistent deployments
Automated report generation for AWS and Microsoft Azure, enabling effortless generation of insightful reports for cloud-based environments
Developed a versatile CI/CD template for Python, Java, and Node packages, facilitating seamless build and deployment processes on platforms such as GitLab and Azure DevOps
Created multiple Dockerfiles for applications, ensuring efficient containerization and streamlined deployment workflows
Led and managed a team of 6 experts in the creation and maintenance of Docker applications, fostering collaboration and delivering high-quality containerized solutions

Designed and developed a specialized tool leveraging extensive regular expression (RegEx) usage to convert Mainframe COBOL code to Gnu COBOL, streamlining the modernization process and enhancing code compatibility
*Docker, Python, Make, Jira, Confluence, GitLab, Jenkins, Chef, Agile, Shell*

work.summary: CMC Limited is an award-winning provider of risk and performance management software for financial institutions.
highlights: Engineered multiple low-level modules for a global trading engine using C++, contributing to the performance and functionality enhancements of the system
Created and implemented Python-based automated scripts for critical business operations (BOD/EOD activities), enabling efficient and error-free execution of essential tasks
Seamlessly integrated automated tests into a Jenkins CI environment, ensuring robust and reliable testing processes for software development and delivery
*C++, Python, XML, Jenkins, SQL, PL/SQL, Redmine, Agile, Linux, BASH*

publications.name: DevOps Life & Notes
publications.summary: Here I put up most of my notes and blog for my reference

certificates.name: Microsoft Certified: Azure Solutions Architect Expert

awards.title: Tech Star FY21
awards.summary: Each year, Accenture selects a handful of employees for this truly unique leadership program and train them for 6 months on leadership roles.

awards.title: Inventor Award Program FY19
awards.summary: Each year, Accenture celebrates unique ideas and an innovation mindset through the Inventor Award Program, which recognizes and rewards employees who file patent applications or have been granted patents in the previous fiscal year.

awards.title: Accenture Celebrates Excellence(ACE) - FY19 Q4
awards.summary:
Awarded the Client and Customer Award in the individual category for outstanding contribution to client's business outcomes.

The ACE awards program is the formal entity Rewards and Recognition program intended to recognize individuals and teams for demonstrating behavior that contributes to the success of the organization. It celebrates the true spirit of our colleagues who have performed ‘Greater Than’ and applauds people who have consistently delivered results that exceed expectations, individually and as teams.

awards.title: Accenture Celebrates Excellence(ACE) - FY18 Q3
awards.summary:
Awarded the Future Ready Skills Award in the individual category for consistently applying IT skills in client projects and positioning Accenture for future growth.

The ACE awards program is the formal entity Rewards and Recognition program intended to recognize individuals and teams for demonstrating behavior that contributes to the success of the organization. It celebrates the true spirit of our colleagues who have performed ‘Greater Than’ and applauds people who have consistently delivered results that exceed expectations, individually and as teams.

interests.name: Football
interests.summary: Practicing and played football for many years, I also competed on the district stage with some success leading the Accenture Kolkata Football team as well as College Football team

interests.name: Traveling
interests.summary: My favorite way to experience new cultures. Making and planning annual trips to different countries is a challenge I like to embrace. Some places I have traveled to: the UAE, Bhutan, Oman, Saudi Arabia, Canada.
